title: Bloomberg Law Brief: Graber and Malcom on Gun Control (Audio)
itunes:title: Bloomberg Law Brief: Graber and Malcom on Gun Control (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Mark Graber, a professor at the University of Maryland School of Law and Joyce Malcom, a professor at Geoge Mason University Law School, discuss how gun control advocates are now quietly developing a plan to chip away at the gun lobby’s growing clout by teaming up with corporate law firms. They speak with June Grasso and Greg Stohr on "Bloomberg Law."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
(Bloomberg) -- Mark Graber, a professor at the University of Maryland School of Law and Joyce Malcom, a professor at Geoge Mason University Law School, discuss how gun control advocates are now quietly developing a plan to chip away at the gun lobby’s growing clout by teaming up with corporate law firms. They speak with June Grasso and Greg Stohr on "Bloomberg Law."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
